com.ibm.mobile.services.location.geo

Class IBMPolygonArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • IBMPolygon
      • com.ibm.mobile.services.location.geo.IBMPolygonArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBMArea

    public class IBMPolygonArea
extends IBMPolygon
implements IBMArea
    A polygon, defined by a list of linear rings, that can be used to define an IBMGeoAreaTrigger or IBMGeoDwellTrigger.

    Only the first (outer) ring is currently supported for area triggers.

    The objects in this class are immutable The IBMPolygonArea class is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IBMPolygonArea(IBMPolygon polygon) 
      IBMPolygonArea(java.util.List<IBMLinearRing> rings)
      Creates an IBMPolygonArea from a list of linear rings At this time, triggers are only supported on the outer ring.
